accelerate(double) - Method in class asteroids.game.Participant
Accelerates in the direction that the participant is rotated.

This method will be invoked because of button presses and timer events.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class asteroids.game.ParticipantCountdownTimer
When the interval has passed, stops the timer and makes the callback, as long as the participant has not expired.

Plays sounds depending on which button was clicked.

Adds a new Participant
ALIEN_DELAY - Static variable in class asteroids.game.Constants
Delay after which an alien ship appears.
ALIENSHIP_SCALE - Static variable in class asteroids.game.Constants
Scaling factors used for alien ships of size 0 and 1.
ALIENSHIP_SCORE - Static variable in class asteroids.game.Constants
Score earned for alien ships of size 0 and 1.
applyFriction(double) - Method in class asteroids.game.Participant
Simulates friction by accelerating the participant opposite to its direction of motion.
Asteroid - Class in asteroids.participants
Represents asteroids
Asteroid(int, int, double, double, int, Controller) - Constructor for class asteroids.participants.Asteroid
Throws an IllegalArgumentException if size or variety is out of range.
ASTEROID_SCALE - Static variable in class asteroids.game.Constants
Scaling factors used for asteroids of size 0, 1, and 2.
ASTEROID_SCORE - Static variable in class asteroids.game.Constants

asteroidDestroyed() - Method in class asteroids.game.Controller
An asteroid has been destroyed
AsteroidDestroyer - Interface in asteroids.destroyers
Used to mark Participants that destroy Asteroids.
Asteroids - Class in asteroids.game
The main class for the application.
Asteroids() - Constructor for class asteroids.game.Asteroids
 
asteroids.destroyers - package asteroids.destroyers
A Participant class that implements one of these interfaces "marks" its objects as being "destroyers" of the objects of some other Participant class.
asteroids.game - package asteroids.game
This package contains the high-level classes that coordinate the appearance and operation of the game.
asteroids.participants - package asteroids.participants
All of the classes in this package extend the abstract Participant class to define a new kind of participant in the game.
